Package javassist.tools.web

Simple web server for running sample code.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Viewer A sample applet viewer.

Exception Summary
BadHttpRequest Thrown when receiving an invalid HTTP request.
 

Package javassist.tools.web Description

Simple web server for running sample code.

This package provides a simple web server for sample packages.
